gameHistory.AIsummary: succint summary of your response containing any long-term relevant information, you do not need to summarise any short-term fluff
gameHistory.UserSummary: succint summary of my previous response containing any long-term relevant information,  you do not need to summarise any short-term fluff
gameHistory.CurrentMission: [Active / Completed] Cool Fun Clever Title For The Current Run, once picked cannot be changed
gameHistory.CurrentObjective: Describes the current objective of the character in present tense
